metadata.title: Plan before you prompt
metadata.description: Aprende a planificar antes de hacer prompts para obtener mejores resultados con Lovable
metadata.author: Mastering Lovable Team

content.text: Before using Lovable, define what you're building. Skipping this step is like starting a painting without deciding what you're painting. Use a quick planning session—pen and paper, voice notes, ChatGPT, whatever works—to answer these four questions:

items: What is this product or feature?
What is the one key action the user should take?
